title: 25 Years of interACT: A Success Story for International and Crossdisciplinary Cooperation

author: Rüdiger Dillmann, Humanoids and Intelligence Systems Lab, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT)

It's a pleasure for me to give.

And it exactly match with the beginning of Alex Waibel's career in call.
So he got a chair on computer science.
And came to us.

They bring back.
